fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: A child companion who befriended, served, and observed the Prophet ﷺ since the Hijrah, when he was 10 years old, and grew up to be a prominent narrator of hadith
Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph
Wife of the Prophet ﷺ and daughter of ʿUmar, the second caliph

fullname: Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
searchname: Umm Salamah Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
info: Wife of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ
Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Umm ʿUthman bint Sufyān or Umm Walad
Nāfiʿ Abu ʿAbdullāh Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar
searchname: Nafi Abu Abdullah Mawla Ibn Umar

info: 8th century scholar of Qurʾānic exegisis and ḥadith
8th century author of the famous Sīrat Rasūlullah, a biography of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ

fullname: ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Abi Thawr
searchname: Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Abi Thawr

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Jaʿfar ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām

fullname: Manṣūr ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Wahb ibn ʿUthmān ibn Ṭalḥah
searchname: Mansur ibn Abdur-Rahman ibn Wahb ibn Uthman ibn Talhah
info: Son of Ṣafiyyah bint Shaybah, sometimes referred to as Manṣur ibn Ṣafiyyah
8th century jurist, author, ascetic, and hafiẓ
